name: Supersonique Extrême Giga Vitesse 9x10^3+1
description:
You're about to be décoiffed !

The gods of the rhythm have invoqued the 4 best rhythm players in the entire galaxy. Together, you have to escape the French president and at the same time to bear the beats of a 9001-year symphony. 

But only the best player will be victorous.

You can decide to fight your way through the rhythm or you can choose not to. But beware of any of the other players quirks: Thomuscle, David, TractoPaul and The Cat !

The backgrounds are evoquant of liberty and fantasy. 

NOTE: Only playable with controller

Game created for the Enjmin (French video game University) game jam: Enjam 2018. Topic : It's Over 9000 ! 

Credits: 

  • Programmers : Damien Crechet, Alfred Brisarc, Jorge Noguera
  • 2D/3D Artists : Agathe Loubière, Thomas Garcia, Jorge Noguera
  • Game Designers : Corinne LeToquin, Paul Barbier
  • Sound Designer & Composer : Thomas Garcia
  • Project Manager : William Désert
